kubernetes_service.description: A Service is an abstraction which defines a logical set of pods and a policy by which to access them - sometimes called a micro-service.

metadata.description: Standard service's metadata. For more info see [Kubernetes reference](https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#metadata)

spec.description: Spec defines the behavior of a service. [Kubernetes reference](https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#spec-and-status)
